title: Scientific Computation
description: Computer arithmetic, stability, sensitivity. Numerical methods for polynomial manipulation, interpolation, data fitting, integration, differentiation, solving linear and non-linear systems, ordinary differential equations and eigenvalue problems.
prerequisites: Prerequisite(s): MATH 1AA3  or 1ZB3 , and MATH 1B03  or 1ZC3 ; COMPSCI 2C03 ; One of MATH 2C03  or 2Z03  is recommended.
antirequisites: Antirequisite(s): COMPENG 3SK3 , 3SK4, MECHTRON 3X03 , SFWRENG 3X03, 4X03 . MECHTRON 3X03 , MATH 3NA3 , 4NA3, CHEMENG 2E04 , CIVENG 2E03 , ENGPHYS 2CE4, 3NM4 , MECHENG 3F04 . Not open to students in a Software Engineering or Mechatronics Engineering program
schedule: Three lectures, one tutorial (one hour); one term
courseText: Computer arithmetic, stability, sensitivity. Numerical methods for polynomial manipulation, interpolation, data fitting, integration, differentiation, solving linear and non-linear systems, ordinary differential equations and eigenvalue problems.
Three lectures, one tutorial (one hour); one term
Prerequisite(s): MATH 1AA3  or 1ZB3 , and MATH 1B03  or 1ZC3 ; COMPSCI 2C03 ; One of MATH 2C03  or 2Z03  is recommended.
